## Simulation

Simulation size.
```{r}
nreps = 3
( nsample = c(5e1, 5e2, 5e3) )
```

Simulated coefficients and SEs
```{r}
sims = list()
for (ns in nsample)
sims[[as.character(ns)]] = 
  replicate(nreps, {
  ctl <- lmrob.control(k.max=500,maxit.scale=500)
  dat = makeData(ns,curve=0,tdist=T,tau=0)
  fit = lmrob(Y~Z+R, data=dat,method='MM',control=ctl)
  zpos = pmatch('Z', names(coef(fit)))
  c(coef(fit)[zpos], vhat=vcov(fit)[zpos,zpos])
})
```

Are the coefficient estimates biased?  How much?
```{r}
sapply(sims, 
       function(simres) t.test(simres[pmatch('Z', rownames(simres)),]))
```

How about the variance estimate?

```{r}
sims.V =
  sapply(sims, 
       function(simres) 
       {
         zbar = mean(simres[pmatch('Z', rownames(simres)),])
         zbar.m2 =var(simres[pmatch('Z', rownames(simres)),])
         zbar.m4 = mean( ((simres[pmatch('Z', rownames(simres)),]) - zbar)^4 )
           v.simSE = (zbar.m4 - zbar.m2^2)/sqrt(ncol(simres)) 
           vhatbar = mean(simres['vhat',])
           vhatbarSE = sd(simres['vhat',])/sqrt(ncol(simres))
           c(v.sim=zbar.m2, v.simSE=v.simSE, 
             vhatbar=vhatbar, vhatbarSE=vhatbarSE)
       }
         )

sims.V       
```
